item.title: Lamp server
item.description: lamp_server Objective Configure Linux server. Genrally speaking, this is a LAMP server. Description Provided EC2 server with ssh access on AWS with AWS Linux installed with up to date OS. Server will be x86 64 bit. Public IP for ssh and www access A user with ssh access and a key file for ssh Server firewall will be open Domain names: clearlight.one, clearlight.app Install and configure following software: Amazon utilities: amazon-ec2-utils AWS CLI version 2 version 2.
